DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to compare Atlas Genetics io® system results with those obtained from comparator devices.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Atlas Genetics io® CTNG System
DOC.criteria: 1. Symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals ≥14 years of age 1. Treatment with antibiotics known to be effective against Chlamydia trachomatis and/or Neisseria gonorrhoeae within the previous 4 weeks before inclusion in the study. 2. Unable to selfobtain a vaginal swab or urine sample of at least 30 mL
